speaker: agent

text: So, ma' am, like, the benefits you will be receiving after this, Ma' am, you don't have to pay anything for your medications or prescriptions.

speaker: agent
text: So, ma' am, like, to get these benefits, I will just ask you two to three qualifying questions, like, is your Medicare part A and part B is active right now?
